settings.title: Add Functional Benefits To Any Drink

settings.text: 3-in-1 herbal, enzyme-rich and high mineral digestive aid that relieves bloat, gas and IBS symptoms.
settings.list_item2: No sugar, sweeteners, flavors or artificial ingredients that can irritate your gut and digestion
settings.list_item3: Support your gut for less than $1.20 a day + 100% Money Back Guarantee

settings.title: Best Drinks for Gut Health
settings.text:
Maintaining a healthy digestive system is important for overall well-being, and what you drink can play a significant role in supporting gut health. Whether you're looking to improve digestion, enhance nutrient absorption, or simply boost your daily wellness, choosing the right beverages is key.

Buoy's electrolyte and mineral drops are expertly formulated to support digestive health. Easily added into any drink, these drops are the perfect addition to your daily routine, providing essential minerals that help promote a balanced gut environment.

Discover why hydration and the right nutrient intake are fundamental for a happy, healthy digestive system and how Buoy can be part of your solution.

‚úì Why Gut Health is Essential for Good Health
‚úì The Science Behind Electrolytes
‚úì Ingredients You Should Avoid for a Healthy Gut
‚úì Our Gut-Friendly Electrolyte Solution

Plus, a sneak peek of our favorite electrolyte for a healthy gut!

settings.title: üíß Fluid Balance
settings.text: Adequate hydration helps dissolve fats and soluble fiber, aiding in smooth digestion and preventing issues like constipation.

settings.title: üîÑ Nutrient Absorption
settings.text: Water is a necessary component in the process of breaking down nutrients for use by the body.

settings.title: üåø Detoxification
settings.text: Efficient hydration aids in flushing toxins out of the body, promoting a healthy gut environment.

settings.title: Essential Drinks for Digestive Health
settings.text_bottom: Hydration and electrolyte balance play an important role in maintaining digestive health. Proper hydration is essential for the efficient function of the digestive system, affecting everything from nutrient absorption to waste elimination.

settings.suptext:
Choosing the right beverages is crucial for supporting your digestive system. Here‚Äôs a look at some top choices:

Probiotic-Rich Beverages: Drinks like kefir and kombucha introduce beneficial bacteria to the gut, which aid digestion and support the immune system.

Herbal Teas: Ginger and peppermint teas are not only soothing but also help in relieving gastrointestinal irritation, reducing bloating, and improving overall digestion.

Electrolyte-Enhanced Water: Water enhanced with electrolytes, such as Buoy drops, ensures that fluid balance is maintained, which is essential for optimal digestive function.

Optimize Your Gut Health with Buoy Drops

Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte and mineral drops are specifically formulated to enhance hydration benefits:

üîç Mineral-Rich Formula: Supplies essential electrolytes like magnesium and potassium that support muscle contractions and nerve signals in the digestive tract.

üå± Herbal Ingredients: Includes ginger and peppermint, which are known for their natural digestive soothing properties.

‚úÖ Easy Integration: Simply add a light squeeze of Buoy to any drink to fortify your body with digestive support throughout the day.

How Buoy Supports Gut Health:

Buoy's electrolyte and mineral drops are expertly formulated to support a healthy digestive system in several key ways:

‚è∞ Promotes Regularity: Helps maintain fluid balance, which is essential for regular bowel movements.

üòé Soothes the Digestive Tract: Ingredients like ginger and peppermint in Digestion Drops help alleviate discomfort such as bloating and gas.

ü•ó Enhances Nutrient Absorption: Optimal electrolyte levels ensure that digestive enzymes function effectively.

Incorporating Buoy‚Äôs digestion drops into your daily routine is an effortless way to support your digestive health, ensuring your gut remains balanced and functional. Simply add the drops to your favorite beverage and enjoy the benefits of a well-supported digestive system.

settings.title: Easy electrolyte boost
settings.content: "You have no idea how much I have come to use Buoy. I take these drops with me everywhere."

settings.title: Sugar free hydration
settings.content: Great hydration that mixes well with almost anything. Love that it's sugar and stevia free without natural flavors.

settings.title: Amazingly hydrated
settings.content: I've finally found my go to electrolyte product that I can add to all my drinks

settings.title: Electrolytes for recovery!
settings.content: Whether it's from a workout or from a night out, these electrolytes are a part of my recovery routine.

settings.title: Buoy‚Äôs Solution: The Perfect Electrolyte Balance for Gut Health
settings.text:
Buoy's purposefully unflavored and unsweetened line of zero calorie electrolyte drops infuse any beverage with fast-acting hydration that works at the cellular level. Sourced from nature's most powerful ingredients.

Incorporate these versatile electrolyte drops into your daily routine to support digestive health, promote nutrient absorption, and maintain a balanced gut environment. Ideal for anyone looking to boost their digestive wellness effortlessly.

Clean & Pure ‚Äî Gut Formulated

‚úì 0 Sugar
‚úì 0 Calories & Carbs

settings.suptitle: Real-World Benefits of Buoy for Gut Health
settings.suptext: Discover the tangible impacts of Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte and mineral drops through the experiences of real users who have seen significant improvements in their digestive health and overall wellness.

settings.content:
Gut Health Helper
I'm working with a naturopath on my gut due to dysbiosis and SIBO. These drops are a perfect addition to my supplement and detox plan. Plus, it's not another pill to swallow!

My Stomach Pain is GONE
I was the ‚Äòmy stomach hurts‚Äô girl for my entire life, and now that Buoy made these, my entire personality is gone. Obsessed is an understatement.

Extremely Convenient
I love the tiny bottle. I can add a few drops to any beverage, and the electrolytes improve my mood and my digestion.

settings.title: Using Buoy to Improve Digestive Wellness
settings.text:
Incorporating Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte and mineral drops into your daily routine is an effective way to enhance your digestive wellness. These drops are designed not only to improve hydration but also to support efficient digestion and nutrient absorption.

Simple Daily Integration: Start by adding a few drops to your morning water. This helps prepare your digestive system for the day ahead, ensuring you start with adequate hydration.

During Meals: Adding Buoy drops to your drink with meals can aid in the digestion process. The additional electrolytes help break down food more effectively, which can improve nutrient uptake and reduce feelings of bloating or fullness.

Targeted Relief: For those experiencing specific issues such as bloating or indigestion, using Buoy with peppermint or ginger can provide natural relief. These ingredients are known for their soothing properties and help calm an upset stomach.

Customized Use: Depending on your dietary intake and the types of food you consume, you might adjust the amount of Buoy drops you use. More rich, fibrous meals might benefit from an extra squeeze to aid in digestion and to prevent discomfort.

By making Buoy a regular part of your hydration routine, you can help ensure that your digestive system operates smoothly and efficiently. Whether it‚Äôs a glass of water first thing in the morning, a beverage with your meals, or a quick sip when you need digestive support, Buoy makes it easy to maintain digestive health.

settings.title: Can electrolytes improve my running performance and recovery?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Electrolytes play a vital role in maintaining hydration and supporting muscle function, both essential for optimal running performance and efficient recovery. Buoy's electrolyte solutions are specifically designed to replenish lost electrolytes during intense physical activity like running, helping you perform better and recover faster.

settings.title:
What sets Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte solutions apart from traditional sports drinks?

¬†
settings.answer:
Buoy's electrolyte solutions stand out for their clean and pure formulation. Unlike many traditional sports drinks that contain added sugars, sweeteners, and artificial flavors, Buoy's electrolyte drops offer a sugar-free, unflavored option that provides essential electrolytes without unnecessary additives.

Additionally, Buoy's liquid form factor ensures rapid absorption, delivering electrolytes in their most bioavailable form for maximum effectiveness.

settings.title: When is the best time to use Buoy‚Äôs electrolytes during my running routine?
settings.answer:
Buoy's electrolyte products are versatile and can be used at various stages of your running routine. For optimal hydration, it's beneficial to incorporate Buoy before, during, and after your runs.

Pre-run, Buoy helps prepare your body for optimal performance by ensuring adequate hydration. During your run, Buoy aids in maintaining electrolyte balance and preventing dehydration and muscle cramps. Post-run, Buoy supports efficient recovery by replenishing lost electrolytes and promoting hydration.

settings.title: Can Buoy‚Äôs electrolyte products help prevent dehydration and muscle cramps during long runs?
settings.answer: Yes! Buoy's electrolyte solutions are formulated to help prevent dehydration and muscle cramps, particularly during long runs or intense physical activity. By replenishing essential electrolytes like sodium, chloride, potassium, magnesium and calcium, Buoy supports proper hydration and muscle function, reducing the risk of dehydration and cramping and helping you maintain peak performance throughout your run.

settings.title: What should I do if I experience signs of electrolyte imbalance during a run?
settings.answer:
If you experience signs of electrolyte imbalance during a run, such as muscle cramps, fatigue, or dizziness, it's essential to address them right away. Stop running and take a break to rehydrate and replenish electrolytes.

Add a light squeeze of Buoy's electrolyte and mineral drops to any drink to quickly restore electrolyte balance. Additionally, stretching and massaging affected muscles can help alleviate cramping. If symptoms persist or worsen, seek medical attention promptly.
